casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Gene LEDWELL. No. 291P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of May 2005 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
